Name: MessageTextUserLogon
Control Name: Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on
Default Value: Domain Controller: This system is for authorized use only. Unauthorized access is prohibited and may be subject to criminal and civil penalties. By logging in, you acknowledge and consent to monitoring and recording for security and administrative purposes. If such monitoring reveals evidence of unauthorized activity, it may be provided to appropriate authorities
Default Value: Member Server: This system is for authorized use only. Unauthorized access is prohibited and may be subject to criminal and civil penalties. By logging in, you acknowledge and consent to monitoring and recording for security and administrative purposes. If such monitoring reveals evidence of unauthorized activity, it may be provided to appropriate authorities
Default Value: Workgroup Member: This system is for authorized use only. Unauthorized access is prohibited and may be subject to criminal and civil penalties. By logging in, you acknowledge and consent to monitoring and recording for security and administrative purposes. If such monitoring reveals evidence of unauthorized activity, it may be provided to appropriate authorities
Availability: Domain Controller, Member Server, Workgroup Member

Name: MessageTextUserLogonTitle
Control Name: Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on
